channel.title: Phys Exhume charges spent too quickly
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was Phys and decided to Exhume. However, I changed my mind same day, and deselected my target and then chose another. I used up all three charges by this.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I was expecting my first charge to be refunded, ie. not spent, and only one charge in total to be spent.
#### Steps to reproduce: Exhume something, deselect it, exhume something else. All in the same day.
#### Comments: None. Hope the above is sufficient information to go on.
